Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.11090199]HIV-1:inhibition of HIV-1 infection in CD4 APJ cells(IC50=3.3 Î¼M).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Mechanism of action: APJ receptor could help HIV virus enter the target cells. The peptide can bind with APJ receptor and block virus entry, thus inhibiting virus infection.

Literature.Title: Apelin, the natural ligand of the orphan seven-transmembrane receptor APJ, inhibits human immunodeficiency virus type 1 entry.
Literature.Author: Cayabyab M, Hinuma S, Farzan M, Choe H, Fukusumi S, Kitada C, Nishizawa N, Hosoya M, Nishimura O, Messele T, Pollakis G, Goudsmit J, Fujino M, Sodroski J.
